target_name: ICT 접근성을 상당 수준으로 증가시키고, 2020년까지 최빈개도국의 보편적인 인터넷 접근성 달성을 위해 노력

en.target: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020
en.title: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology
en.indicator_name: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology
en.national_indicator_description: This indicator is defined as the percentage of inhabitants living within range of a mobile-cellular signal  (2G, 3G or LTE), irrespective of whether or not they are mobile phone subscribers or users.
en.global_metadata_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 214 KB)

en.graph_title: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology
en.source_url_text_1: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology
en.page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
